Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
October 2020 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Welcome to another edition of The Justia Insider! Brrr, autumn is here, and it never comes alone… plenty of Halloween fun is around for the Justia family this month! We highly encourage everyone to participate in the Justia Ghoulies Awards and the Pumpkin Carving Contest. Show us what you’ve got for this Halloween! Horribly awesome prizes are waiting for you all!

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Justia Amplify Review Tool: This platform adds value to our Justia Amplify product by providing our clients with a centralized, professional looking page to ask for client reviews.

GMB Media Downloads: We have added yet more value to our Justia Amplify service. We can now make a copy of all media resources in a GMB listing to produce even better LSA pages.

50-State Regulations: We published the regulation codes for all 50 states. It was a joint effort between Justia and Carl Malamud, who collected and provided us with the dataset.

Internal Tools Updates: Our most recent improvement is a neat Slack integration. This integration will allow anyone to instantly create meeting minutes, maintain better communication, and save time. We will be sharing this feature with everyone in the company very soon.

Voter Resource Center: In light of the 2020 general election in November, Justia has launched a Voter Resource Center with information on how citizens can vote. You also can find more information about how to safely drop off your ballot during the COVID-19 pandemic at votercadechallenge.com.

Redesign of the Justia Corporate Center: We recently redesigned our corporate center to look more modern and reflect the company's current state and focus. The primary purpose of these pages is to give our visitors a glimpse into who we are and what we do.

Reminders

Protect yourself this fall and winter with a flu vaccine. Health experts are stressing the importance of flu vaccination this year. With no onsite vaccinations this year, Justia will reimburse the cost of your flu vaccination.

upcoming holidays

Dates to Remember
October 31st - Halloween

Trick or Treat! Halloween, also known as All Hallow's Eve or All Saint's Eve, is a fun autumn festival celebrated on the night of October 31. Even when some people associate Halloween with fear, it is actually an opportunity to welcome the unknown and release negativity by bringing joy into our daily lives.

*This is a non-federal holiday. It is not officially recognized. For more information about paid holidays please visit Justikia.

NEW INTERNS | NEW FULL TIME EMPLOYEES

Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

Noelia Amador

Front-End Team

Hello everyone, my name is Noelia Méndez, or simply Nóe. I'm 21 years old, and I am from the port of Manzanillo, Colima. I just graduated from Computer Systems Engineering. I am focused on front-end development. I am curious and a bit of an extrovert. I don't give up too easily, and I hate leaving things incomplete. I love dancing, singing, laughing, and enjoying every day of my life. I am not afraid to ask for or give help.

Ana Elena Aguilar

Help Desk Team

Hi everyone, my name is Ana Aguilar. I'm 32 years old, I'm from Saltillo, Coahuila, and I’ve been working on IT for about ten years in different areas: programming, project management, and support. I enjoy reading and baking in my free time. I firmly believe that spending time with the people we love and taking time for self-care is a big part of a balanced life. I look forward to starting this new journey and working with you all.

Wellness Tech

As a result of the lockdown, stress may take a high toll on our productivity and, most importantly, our health. Don’t panic! Stress relief is right at your fingertips. In addition to the tips provided in our last newsletter, we would like to share new stress management tools. Try them out, reduce stress, and get more done.

www.calm.com Calm promises to help you sleep better, boost confidence, and reduce stress and anxiety, all with the help of guided meditations, soothing music, and bedtime stories.

www.yogastudioapp.com In this app, you’ll find general classes for beginners, as well as classes to help with mental health and back pain. There’s even a Desk Series you can do during a much-needed break.

www.headspace.com Headspace is an app that helps you learn how to meditate and live mindfully. There are hundreds of sessions that help you deal with stress, sleep, focus, and anxiety, as well as shorter guided meditations.

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

The Knight in Rusty Armor

Available on Amazon

"It is one of my favorite books because it is full of pearls of wisdom. It is easy to read and includes some quite remarkable teachings about self-knowledge. The story shows how people tend to seek others' approval without considering their own well-being. Little by little, they get themselves locked down in heavy armor. Throughout the story, the readers can understand the importance of being who you are from the inside and learn that the key to defeating their biggest fears is knowing who they really are."

- Ana Espinoza

Collaborators: Miguel Berlanga, Donovan Coronado, Haydee Garcia, Alejandra Medina, Lauren Moskie, Rene Peralta & Jose Ramos
